title: Italian Spa Escape with Indulgent Wine and Dining Experiences
description: Discover the striking beauty, rich culture and delicious cuisine of one of Italy’s best-kept secrets: Umbria. Venture to the charming Perugia for a relaxing stay at Le Tre Vaselle Resort & Spa with daily buffet breakfast, daily two-course dinner of authentic local cuisine, daily access to the blissful spa, a welcome drink each on arrival, an exclusive wine tasting and a leisurely 2pm late checkout.

vendor_name: Borgo San Faustino Country Relais and Spa
title: Exquisite Heritage Italian Escape with Gourmet Inclusions
description: Discover the striking beauty, rich culture and extraordinary produce of one of Italy’s best-kept secrets, Umbria. Venture on a road trip amid the breathtaking natural scenery of rolling hills and medieval towns of this central region of Italy and reach the charming Borgo San Faustino Country Relais & Spa - a tranquil sanctuary set in an historic farmhouse near Orvieto. Your Italian holiday includes delicious daily breakfast, a decadent three-course dinner with drinks, a sumptuous two-course lunch, access to the on-site spa, two bottles of locally produced wine and an exclusive wine tasting with local delicacies in the property's striking wine cellar.
location_description: Borgo San Faustino Country Relais and Spa*

title: Italy Countryside Retreat
description:
Experience a once-in-a-lifetime stay among the lush hills of Italy’s Umbria region at the beautiful Aethos Saragano - a charming property with just 20 luxury suites and apartments, set in a traditional medieval village, completely restored and brought back to its original splendour.

One of the country's best-kept secrets, Umbria is a picturesque destination where you’ll experience a more authentic side of Italy, filled with local artisan activities, delicious food and fine wines. Explore all there is on offer and immerse yourself in the picturesque beauty of this scenic region, blessed with centuries-old olive groves and vineyards.

Live like a local in one of the carefully restored suites and apartments, complete with fully equipped kitchens, antique furnishings, plush bedding and sweeping views over the hills. 

Step outside your Italian-style room and discover the village: savour traditional recipes at CECI Restaurant, splash into the hotel's swimming pool surrounded by olive trees, relax at the blissful spa (complete with both Finnish and Turkish saunas and an array of massage treatments) and enjoy curated experiences to learn more about the region, from truffle hunting to Umbrian cooking classes and beyond (charges apply).
